scripts.watch:all: npm run clean && npm-run-all watch:lib start:app
scripts.scroll:prod: cd projects/scroll-here && npm --no-git-tag-version version patch && ng build scroll-here --prod
scripts.validators:prod: cd projects/validators && npm --no-git-tag-version version patch && ng build validators --prod
